content.text: Happy Friday! What are you up to this weekend?
Not sure yet, but I'm excited to see what it brings! What about you?

I'm going to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer. I'm also trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.

That's so sweet of you to treat your mom! I'm sure she'll love it. I'm not married, but my family is very supportive of my music and writing. I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could have traveled more this summer. I spent most of my time playing guitar and video games.
I love playing ice hockey! I wish I could play more often, but it's hard to find the time.
I totally understand. I'm also trying to find a way to make more time for my hobbies.
I'm sure you'll find a way! It sounds like you're a really busy person, but you also have a lot of fun hobbies.
Thanks! I try to make the most of my time.
